FuncDef: The display diffserv domain command displays the DiffServ domain configuration. The display diffserv domain command displays the DiffServ domain configuration.

ParaDef.Info:
Displays the detailed configuration of a specified DiffServ domain.
The value must be the name of an existing DiffServ domain on the device.

Displays summary configurations of all DiffServ domains.
-

ExtraInfo: After creating a DiffServ domain and configuring the mappings in the DiffServ domain, you can use the display diffserv domain command to view the configuration of the DiffServ domain.
